DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy safety AZD8529 smoke cessation female smoker .
DOC.brief_title: The Study AZD8529 Smoking Cessation Female Smokers
DOC.detailed_description: This 19-week , multi-center , randomize , Phase 2 clinical study compare efficacy two different dos AZD8529 ( 1.5 40 mg ) smoking cessation . Up 2 week allow Screening Period , follow 1-week , single-blind run-in period . At end Study Week 1 ( Study Day 8 ) , medication compliance one factor use predictive enrichment strategy .
DOC.criteria: Be female smoker age 18 75 year . Want quit smoking . Be currently ( last 30 day ) smoke 10 cigarette per day report less 3 month consecutive smoking abstinence past year . Be able , opinion site investigator ( SI ) , understand follow protocolspecified instruction understand provide write informed consent . Be willing provide personal information entry clinical trial registry . Agree use continue use least one acceptable contraceptive method ( oral contraceptive , IUDs , contraceptive implant skin , contraceptive ring patch injection , diaphragm spermicide , condom spermicide , abstinence ) , childbearing potential , must fulfill one follow criterion screen : postmenopausal define amenorrhea least 12 month follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) level laboratory define postmenopausal range and/or documentation irreversible surgical sterilization hysterectomy , bilateral oophorectomy bilateral salpingectomy tubal ligation verify Site Investigator . Agree use smoke behavioral intervention ( selfhelp formal treatment ) , acupuncture , smoke cessation pharmacotherapy study . Agree refrain use dietary/herbal supplement vitamins mineral 7 day prior receive study drug throughout 13week treatment period . Agree attend require clinic appointment ( include 3 eye exam ) course 19week study . Please contact site information
